title: Ani kophaa koo miti yeroo gidiraa koo ,

lines: Ani kophaa koo miti yeroo gidiraa koo ,
Anaa wajjin jirta Yesus yaa Mootii ko,
Ati na geggeessi akka tola keetti,
Ani kophaa koo miti yeroo gidiraa koo ,
Anaa wajjin jirta Yesus yaa Mootii ko,
Ani kophaa koo miti yeroo gidiraa koo ,
Anaa wajjin jirta Yesus yaa Mootii ko,
Ani kophaa koo miti yeroo gidiraa koo ,
Anaa wajjin jirta Yesus yaa Mootii ko,
Situ na barbaade ani maalan siif kenne
Karaa badiisaa irraa ofitti na waamtee
Galanni siif ta'a kan na fayyifatte.
Ani kophaa koo miti yeroo gidiraa koo ,
Anaa wajjin jirta Yesus yaa Mootii ko,
